abstract: St Louis Blues will play its first-ever outdoor game when Chicago Blackhawks visit Busch Stadium on Jan 2, 2017.

headline.main: St. Louis to Host Blues-Blackhawks Classic

snippet: The St. Louis Blues will host the Chicago Blackhawks in the Winter Classic at Busch Stadium on Jan. 2, the N.H.L. said.
lead_paragraph: The St. Louis Blues will host the Chicago Blackhawks in the Winter Classic at Busch Stadium on Jan. 2, the N.H.L. said.
